fields.title: Python Web Developer
fields.description: I highlight my experience within the scope of my responsibilities, focusing on the maintenance and continuous development of new features in Django systems. Among these achievements, I emphasize my crucial role in enhancing tintim.app, a powerful tool for tracking WhatsApp sales, adopted by over 200 companies. In my professional routine, I have a strong expertise with Docker containers, tasks on Linux servers, and advanced skills in incident investigations using log analysis tools.

fields.title: Python Developer
